short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-powered tools for rental negotiations, weather forecasts, scams, events, visa, and local undiscovered gems.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We chatted with 1,500 digital nomads to learn the good, the bad, and the ugly of Airbnb living. Using their tales from the road, we built Airbnb for Digital Nomads to dodge the common headaches and keep the cool parts. Start your 30 Days Free Trial. No credit card required.

𝐎𝐮𝐫 𝐀𝐈 𝐡𝐚𝐬 𝐛𝐞𝐞𝐧 𝐝𝐢𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐥𝐲 𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐢𝐧𝐞𝐝 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐨𝐯𝐞𝐫 𝟏𝟎 𝐦𝐢𝐥𝐥𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐯𝐚𝐫𝐢𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞𝐬 extracted from seasoned nomads' insights, worldwide weather data, events, local culture, proverbs, scams, and other relevant travel info. 𝐈𝐭'𝐬 𝐥𝐢𝐤𝐞 𝐡𝐚𝐯𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐚 𝐬𝐞𝐚𝐬𝐨𝐧𝐞𝐝 𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐯𝐞𝐥𝐞𝐫 𝐚𝐬 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐥 𝐠𝐮𝐢𝐝𝐞.

-💰 𝐒𝐜𝐨𝐫𝐞 𝐃𝐢𝐬𝐜𝐨𝐮𝐧𝐭𝐬:  Save significantly with AI-negotiated rents; e.g., reducing a $3,645 monthly rent down to $650.

-☁️ 𝐖𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐫 𝐅𝐨𝐫𝐞𝐜𝐚𝐬𝐭𝐬:  Know the climate to plan your stay better.

-🛑 𝐒𝐜𝐚𝐦 𝐃𝐞𝐭𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧: Stay clear of scams lurking at your dream spots.

-🌈 𝐈𝐧𝐜𝐥𝐮𝐬𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐯𝐞𝐥:  Discover welcoming communities for Black and LGBTQ+ travelers.

- 🔍𝐒𝐢𝐦𝐩𝐥𝐢𝐟𝐢𝐞𝐝 𝐒𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐜𝐡𝐞𝐬:  Apply your preferred filters and price ranges effortlessly with a single click, finding your perfect home faster.

-🛂 𝐕𝐢𝐬𝐚 𝐀𝐥𝐞𝐫𝐭: Stay informed about the visa requirements and policies of your destination, ensuring a hassle-free nomadic journey!

-🎛️ 𝐏𝐞𝐫𝐟𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐞𝐝 𝐅𝐢𝐥𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐬:  Tailor your search with stored and easily applicable filters to match your preferences.

-💬 𝐋𝐨𝐜𝐚𝐥 𝐆𝐞𝐦𝐬 𝐃𝐢𝐬𝐜𝐨𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐲 𝐂𝐡𝐚𝐭: Dive into engaging chats to unearth local hidden treasures and make the most of your stay.

Why stick to the ordinary when the extraordinary is just a click away? 
🖱️ Ditch the tedious Airbnb search grind and hop onto the Airbnb for Digital Nomads bandwagon. With a dash of AI 🤖 and a sprinkle of inclusivity 🌈, we're not just changing the game, we're recreating it. 

Hit that install button, 𝐤𝐢𝐜𝐤𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐫𝐭 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐟𝐫𝐞𝐞 𝐭𝐫𝐢𝐚𝐥, and join the revolution. 

👍 Your future self will thank you. 👍
